## User Story  
**As a** [type of user]  
**I want** [goal]  
**So that** [benefit]  

## Acceptance Criteria  
- [ ] Condition 1  
- [ ] Condition 2  
- [ ] ...  

## Gherkin Scenarios  
```gherkin
Scenario: [Scenario name]  
  Given [initial context]  
  When [action taken]  
  Then [expected outcome]
